name: Sam Can II - Valley of Flying Rocks
name_original: Sam Can II - Valley of Flying Rocks
description:
Sam Can II was made for the Godot Wild Jam #15 in about two days. You have to help Sam escape the Valley of Flying Rocks under constant threat of the evil Zapper that want's to roast poor Sam! Use your mouse to guide Sam from portal to portal and collect valuable floppy disks. Keep Sam alive as long as you can!

Third Party Licenses

This game was made with the free and open source game engine Godot. Please check it out here!

I also used some third party assets:

  • Font by codeman38
  • Sound effects by Juhani Junkala
  • Music by CodeManu

Please see the file license.txt included in your download for details.
